General.Name: Dongjiang Environmental Co Ltd
General.Description: Dongjiang Environmental Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides environmental services in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Industrial Waste Recycling, Industrial Waste Treatment and Disposal, Rare and Precious Metals Recycling, Municipal Waste Treatment and Disposal, Renewable Energy Utilization, Environmental Engineering and Services, Trading and Others, and Household Appliance Dismantling segments. The company is engaged in the processing and sale of recycled products; recycling of rare and precious metals; and trading of chemical products. It also provides environmental engineering, hazardous and municipal waste treatment, logistics, and household appliance dismantling services, as well as environmental protection systems and services; develops software; and generates biogas power. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Dongjiang Environmental Company Limited and changed its name to Dongjiang Environmental Company Limited in December 2010. Dongjiang Environmental Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

4.Name: Mr. Zehua  Li
4.Title: Gen. Counsel, Board Sec. and Head of Securities, Legal, HR & Political Work Department
